DataElement.preferredName: Spectral Domain Optical Coherence Tomography Assessment Normal Abnormal Not Obtained Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates a modification of optical coherence tomography with an increased ability to provide depth-resolved tissue structure information. It is used to perform high-resolution cross-sectional imaging and analysis of structural changes in the eye during disease progression.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Spectral Domain Optical Coherence Tomography Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A modification of optical coherence tomography with an increased ability to provide depth-resolved tissue structure information. It is used to perform high-resolution cross-sectional imaging and analysis of structural changes in the eye during disease progression._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A modification of optical coherence tomography with an increased ability to provide depth-resolved tissue structure information. It is used to perform high-resolution cross-sectional imaging and analysis of structural changes in the eye during disease progression.

Concepts.definition: A modification of optical coherence tomography with an increased ability to provide depth-resolved tissue structure information. It is used to perform high-resolution cross-sectional imaging and analysis of structural changes in the eye during disease progression.

Property.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The value domain for Normal, abnormal, not obtained, and other summary indicators.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.

Concepts.definition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm. (NCI):Deviating from the norm.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:To come into possession of something. (Concept includes term form "Obtained"):An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
To come into possession of something.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
